coding_practice.title: Product of Array Except Self
coding_practice.description:
Given an integer array nums, return an array answer such that answer[i] is equal to the product of all the elements of nums except nums[i].
The product of any prefix or suffix of nums is guaranteed to fit in a 32-bit integer.
You must write an algorithm that runs in O(n) time and without using the division operation.
coding_practice.constraints:
2 <= nums.length <= 10^5
-30 <= nums[i] <= 30
The input is generated such that answer[i] is guaranteed to fit in a 32-bit integer.
coding_practice.follow up: Can you solve the problem in O(1) extra space complexity? (The output array does not count as extra space for space complexity analysis.)
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用一個陣列 res 儲存最終結果，初始值全為 1。
2. 先從左到右計算每個位置左側的累乘並存入 res。
3. 再從右到左計算每個位置右側的累乘，並與 res 相乘。
4. 最終得到每個位置的答案。
